title: Creamy chicken and potato soup
ingredients: ['110g butter', '60g plain flour', '1 onion, chopped', '1 bunch fresh chives, chopped', '2 litres double cream', '500ml water', '1 litre milk', '3 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons garlic granules', '2 teaspoons dried thyme', '4 potatoes, peeled and cubed', '450g skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, cut into cubes', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
